title: American Horror Story Season 10 Theme Reveal
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: They also said in the teaser that the first story is a Sea story, the second by the Sand. This should be interesting. 😮

There's such a wide breadth of supernatural creatures they could touch on. Sometimes we get things but not in the form we expect, like the minotaur in season 3. I've said this before over the years, but I  really want them to touch on faeries, or creatures that might loosely connect to that like sirens or succubi. The thing about female magic users being stronger rings as a fae thing in my mind. They've explored angels and demons, and various undead. Let's get something from in between both realms. Urban legends sounds neat too.
It's super cold in PTown right now. I was there last weekend and I was totally bundled up, scarf and all. And with the wind on the beach it's sooooo cold.

Returning cast members include Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, Lily Rabe, Finn Wittrock, Frances Conroy, Billie Lourd, Leslie Grossman.

enough chit-chat, pump out a trailer!

Am I the only person who’s thought Rocky Horror? Given its prominence in gay culture, the title (Science Fiction, Double Feature being the opening for the show and film), the lips image used as a teaser so far, and the potential to link it Asylum and Freak Show. 💁‍♂️
